Check related to variances

check_variances.Rd

Check related to variances

Usage

checkVariances(...)

assertVariances(...)

checkCovarMat(mat, p = nrow(mat))

assertCovarMat(
  mat,
  p = nrow(mat),
  .var.name = checkmate::vname(mat),
  add = NULL
)

checkCorMat(mat, p = nrow(mat))

assertCorMat(mat, p = nrow(mat), .var.name = checkmate::vname(mat), add = NULL)

Functions

  • checkVariances(): Check variances and standard deviations

  • assertVariances(): Assert variances and standard deviations

  • checkCovarMat(): Check a variance-covariance matrix

  • assertCovarMat(): Assert a variance-covariance matrix

  • checkCorMat(): Check a correlation matrix

  • assertCorMat(): Assert a correlation matrix
